text: Sunny Brazil!
A perfect country for an unforgettable vacation.
From beaches, beautiful views, important historical sites, and volcanic archipelagos!
In Brazil, you can find everything!
Your task is to choose which destination suits you best!
However, you must visit some places due to their worldwide fame.
To know all that this beautiful South American destination has to offer
Do not miss the following information.
We will tell you ten places to visit in Brazil,
But we warn you that there are sp many more places to visit
Are you ready for an exotic adventure?
Let's Go
No. 1 Porto Seguro
Bahia
Porto Seguro Bay is a city with old buildings but with modern services.
It was built on the Discovery Coast
The beach where the first Portuguese arrived in Brazil.
It also has spaces for the discovery of culture and nightlife
Making it one of the most visited tourist places.
What makes it particular are its diverse beaches
Beautiful paradisiacal places of Brazil.
Here, you can enjoy a natural swimming pool
Kayaking, banana boating, and helicopter rides.
This sounds incredibly fun.
Even I want to go.
The beach is only 6 km from the center of Porto Seguro
And you will have access to chairs, tables, and umbrellas.
You can also enjoy live music, shows, and recitals!
No. 2 Rio de Janeiro
One of the most famous cities in the world
When you think of Rio
You think of Samba, Garotas, Carnivals, and Soccer.
Here, you will find beautiful beaches like Copacabana, Ipanema, and Leblon
Also, the favelas
The neighborhoods where the "Cariocas" or inhabitants of Rio live.
In this cosmopolitan city, you will also find one of the main attractions of the country.
The Redeemer Christ is a symbol of Rio!
Go to the top of Corcovado Hill and enjoy a spectacular view of Rio
Or to the Pão de Açúcar
Which has two funiculars that take visitors to the top to admire Rio.
We suggest you go to Rio on New Year's Eve and in February.
This is the month of the Rio Carnival and Rio Rum.
No. 3 Copacabana Beach-Rio de Janeiro.
This is one of the most famous beaches in Brazil, and the world!
The sidewalk of Copacabana beach is one of the most attractive places in Brazil.
It is one of the most visited promenades since the '40s and '50s of the 20th century.
On the beach, you can play volleyball, paddle, soccer, and enjoy the extensive's bike path in an incredible bike tour.
We recommend you to welcome the New Year here with the Reveillon, fireworks, and music show!
No. 4 Brasilia
Brasilia is the capital of Brazil and is where you will meet modernity face to face.
It is a beautiful place with many places to eat and with a good infrastructure for events!
If you decide to travel to Brasilia,
You cannot miss the Cathedral of Brasilia
It is one of the great cultural attractions
It was designed by architect Oscar Niemeyer who received the Pritzker Prize in 1988 for this work.
Brasilia also has all the main political places in Brazil.
In the Monumental Axis, you will find the Square of the three powers,
The Cultural Complex of the Republic, the National Library Leonel de Moura Brizola, and the JK Memorial.
No. 5 Archipelago Fernando de Noronha
Pernambuco
When we told you that Brazil has a lot to give
We meant it.
This Brazilian volcanic archipelago is located in Pernambuco
And is made up of 21 islands.
Only one of them is inhabited and bears the name of the archipelago.
Here, you will have a great time!
You can enjoy many water activities!
It has the best diving spots in the whole country
You can also go surfing, snorkeling, and hiking!
No. 6 Iguazú National Park
Parana
This national park in the jungle of Misiones guards 20% of the 275 waterfalls shared with Argentina
Known as the Iguazu Falls!
This national park is undoubtedly a spectacular scenic beauty
And recognized as one of the Seven Wonders of the World.
You cannot miss this place at all!
You can make numerous tours.
Therefore, you can appreciate the falls from different angles
From either natural viewpoints, kayaking, or even helicopter!
No. 7  Bonito Natural Park
Mato Grosso do Sul
Bonito is the capital of ecotourism in Brazil.
In its tropical forest crossed by clear rivers with waterfalls and caves
You will enjoy beautiful landscapes.
This region is not well known
Most of those who visit it here  are for hiking.
Yes, if you like the adventure, you must go!
It is located between the Pantanal and the Iguassu Falls, in Mato Grosso do Sul.
Bonito is the best option to explore nature.
It is not cheap to do tours, but we assure you it will be worth it.
No. 8 Manaus
The Amazon
Manaus is the port and capital of the State of Amazonas,
A city whose main attraction is its privileged geographical location.
It is located in the middle of the Amazon rainforest!
Manaus allows you to have access to ecological reserves
Only a few kilometers away from the city.
You will feel like a Tarzan Boy without getting too far away from civilization!
In the city, it is also possible to find places like the Amazon Theater
And other buildings dating from the early twentieth century.
You can also enjoy the gastronomy of typical dishes where the Amazon fish
(considered the best in South America) is the protagonist.
No. 9 Recife
The Venice of Brazil is a city that not the best-known tourist places in the country
We assure you that you will love it!
This beautiful city has a striking contrast between its colonial architecture and modern skyscrapers,
Next to the sea full of coral reefs and warm waters!
Its beaches are ideal for you to take a dip and practice some snorkeling.
A few kilometers from the city, you will find colonial wonders such as Olinda and Igarassu.
Also, with the volcanic archipelago Fernando de Noronha
Just an hour flight away!
No. 10 Ouro Preto
Minas Gerais
This colonial town still stands to show you how the origin of Brazil’s first modern society was.
This small town is located between the mining mountains, in the valley.
Ouro Preto was born thanks to the efforts of exploited mineworkers in the seventeenth century.
Its beautiful architecture gave Ouro Preto the title of National Monument City in 1933
And was declared by UNESCO Cultural Heritage of Humanity in 1980.
In addition to its historical treasures, it also has a rich ecosystem,
Waterfalls, trails, and a protected area as a National Park.
It's like a little slice of heaven
This place also hosts the Winter Festival
The Forum of Arts in July, and the Forum of Letters in November!
Therefore, you can visit at various times of the year.
Do you want to know more?
So are we!
Brazil is full of sites with many experiences waiting for you.
These places mentioned above are just a taste of everything you can do
In this beautiful country.
What are you waiting for ?
Start packing your suitcase today
With your swimsuit and spend a amazing vacation in Brazil
We are sure you will enjoy it to the fullest!
